text: Alfred Koerppen (16 December 1926 – 5 July 2022) was a German organist, music pedagogue, composer and academic. He was professor of composition and music theory at the Hochschule für Musik und Theater Hannover. Koerppen died on 5 July 2022 in Hannover, Germany at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Complete catalogue raisonné of Alfred Koerppen (PDF; 411 kB) Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:20th-century German composers Category:German academics Category:German organists
title: Alfred Koerppen
